title: Quick oat and wholemeal bread
ingredients: ['136g oat flour (or rolled oats ground fine in a coffee grinder or blender)', '20g rolled oats', '80g wholemeal flour', '40g plain flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon honey', '1 1/2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '230ml milk']
